options.content:
ENERGY MANAGEMENT SOLUTIONS,
METER NAME: xxx yyy zzz
METER ID: xxx , SAMPLING INTERVAL: xxx
CLIENT : xxx yyy zzz

panels.description: Status of device, by checking Hz reading from device.
panels.title: DEVICE STATUS

panels.description: Energy reading from device in KWH.
panels.title: SKYMTR ENERGY KWH

panels.description: Average KWH Energy reading per hour. Considering the last 30 days.
panels.title: SKYMTR AVE KWH PERHOUR

panels.description: Peak Load VA Reading of the past 30 days.
panels.title: SKYMTR PEAK LOAD VA

panels.description: Percentage of Load compared to last 24 Hours Load, calculated with Current readings.
panels.title: SKYMTR CURRENT LOAD %

panels.description: Percentage Share of Voltage across each phase. Live reading.
panels.title: SKYMTR VOLT P-P%

panels.description: Any Alerts for this meter will be displayed here.
panels.title: SKYMTR Alerts List

panels.description: Reading of Voltage per phase-phase, average of time interval set.
panels.title: SKYMTR VOLTAGE PER PHASE

panels.description: Reading of Watts per phase average of time interval set.
panels.title: SKYMTR LOAD PER PH

panels.description: Reading of Current per phase average of time interval set.
panels.title: SKYMTR CURRENT PER PHASE

options.content:
The data displayed is based solely on meter readings. All data is confidential under the agreement between Client and M/s. Skylights Energy, Bangalore. Skylights Energy is not responsible or liable for its accuracy or usage.
Sharing requires prior approval from the Client.
